Specific Details: Cllr contacted us to get information of Domestic Abuse to assist her to put forward a motion to Clare County Council asking that they work more towards providing safe housing for those suffering domestic abuse.
Subject Matter: Cllr contacted us to get information of Domestic Abuse to assist her to put forward a motion to Clare County Council asking that they work more towards providing safe housing for those suffering domestic abuse.
Intended Results: Assist a local representative to improve the lives of women and children subjected to Domestic Abuse
Lobbying Activities: Cllr contacted Clare Haven via email. Clare Haven responded via email|Email|2-5

DPOs Lobbied: Donna McGettigan|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::David Griffin|Councillor|Clare County Council
Intended Results: To create a greater awareness of Foetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (FASD) and the challenges faced by people living with FASD and their families/caregivers in Ireland.
Lobbying Activities: Held a briefing day at FASD Ireland HQ which was attended by Deputy Donna McGettigan and Cllr. David Griffin.|Event / Reception|1::Follow-up and RSVP emails were exchanged with all of the above named DPOs.|Email|11-20
